result.title: Xylem: Federal Legislation Fuels Xylem's Multi-Year Growth Potential
result.text: Xylem posted 7% organic YoY growth in Q3, with five-year annual top-line growth averaging 11%, driven by acquisitions and steady organic gains. Margins surged, with EBITDA at 23.2% in Q3, up 100 bps YoY, supported by productivity, pricing, and Xylem's 80/20 simplification program. Measurement & Control Solutions led segment growth at 11%, while Water Solutions & Services delivered 10% growth and top margins of 26.3%.
